module.onboarding.troubleshooting.instru: Follow the instructions below and try to connect again:
Remove the USB cable from your Mudita device and this computer
Inspect the USB port and cable for damages
Reconnect your Mudita device with this computer
Make sure you’re using the cable that came with your Mudita device
Make sure the cable plug goes all the way into the port
Unlock your Mudita device's screen (if applicable)
